entry.title: RT Papi Billy 🛸: The @developer_dao community wants to "build and 🚀" so I'm organizing another hackathon. Again open to all, even if not in the ...
entry.summary:
RT Papi Billy 🛸 The @developer_dao community wants to "build and 🚀" so I'm organizing another hackathon. Again open to all, even if not in the DAO. I'll be hosting a "find a team" social session on Tuesday in the D_D discord. Sign up for the workshop below 👇
Mailchain: 🎉 We’re so excited for the first @developer_dao and Mailchain #Hackathon! 🗓️ Starting on the 5th April 16:30 UTC we are kicking off with a 3-part workshop to introduce our easy to use SDK then its over to the brilliant web3 builders out there! 🧵⤵️ 1/4 https://t.co/Z7EC3tuTXF

RT Mailchain We are so excited to work with and learn from the brilliant developers across web3 Let's shape web3 communication for the whole world! 🌍🌟 #MailchainHackathon
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): You have got a notification! 💌 Join us as we host a three-part workshop on mastering the art of sending Mailchain messages to users' web3 identities using the ultra-smooth @Mailchain_xyz SDK 💭⚒️ Sign up, now → https://lu.ma/enivle3i https://t.co/jmpMhkMlih
